alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Jones; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Baldwin, northwestern Wilkinson, central Bibb, northern Twiggs and southeastern Jones Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Haddock to near Skipperton, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Milledgeville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Payne, Midway-Hardwick, Payne City, Marion, Postell, Allenwood, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Skipperton, Hardwick, Browns Crossing, James and Coopers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Jones; Twiggs; Wilkinson
